label: Floor Mats and Matting
description: Products designed to protect floors and surfaces from dirt, moisture, and wear and tear.
intents: Protect floors from dirt and moisture
Reduce wear and tear on floors

subcategories.label: Entrance Mats
subcategories.description: Mats designed to be placed at the entrance of a building to trap dirt and moisture.

subcategories.label: Anti-Fatigue Mats
subcategories.description: Mats designed to reduce fatigue and discomfort for people who stand for long periods of time.

subcategories.label: Industrial Matting
subcategories.description: Heavy-duty mats designed for industrial and commercial use.

subcategories.label: Outdoor Mats
subcategories.description: Mats designed for outdoor use to trap dirt and moisture and protect surfaces.

subcategories.label: Custom Mats
subcategories.description: Mats designed to be customized with logos, text, or images.
